PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-16902017-12-15,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ISED,  NRC
ActFederal Public Sector Labour Relations Act
SubjectNational Research Council of Canada - Research Council Employees' Association ** Collective Agreement **
PrecisOrder authorizing the National Research Council Canada to ENTER INTO A COLLECTIVE AGREEMENT with the Research Council Employee's Association for all employees in the Technical Category for the period beginning on April 1, 2014 and ending on March 31, 2018, pursuant to Section 112 of the FEDERAL PUBLIC SECTOR LABOUR RELATIONS ACT.
AttachmentsAttachment
